Reference

Base functions

Base functions that support everything else

uas_info()

Extract metadata info from UAS images

print(<uas_info>)

Print a summary of UAS metadata

Data Catalogs

Functions to create data catalogs

uas_report()

Flight summaries

uas_toc()

Generate a Table of Contents of flight summaries

uas_thumbnails_make()

Create image thumbnails

Subsetting and Grouping

Managing and manipulating groups of images

uas_grp_flt()

Parse an image collection into individual flights

print(<uas_grp>)

Prints a UAS Image Collection Groups object

uas_move()

Move UAS images into sub-directories

Exporting

Exporting image locations and other geometries

uas_exp_kml() uas_exp_shp()

Export flight area and camera locations for GIS

Single Images

Individual image utilities

uas_worldfile()

Create world and projection files for UAS images

uas_cropctr()

Crop out the center of images

uas_convert()

Convert file format

uas_rename()

Rename UAS images

Metadata

Managing metadata

uas_metadata_make()

Create flight metadata text files

uas_setflds() uas_getflds() uas_flds_oem()

Manage supplemental metadata fields

Package Settings

Manage package settings

uas_getcache() uas_setcache() uas_clearcache()

Manage cache directory

uas_cameras() uas_readcameras()

Cameras

Other Utility Functions

Other utility functions

uas_path2name_fun()

Creates a function that converts a directory path to a flight name

uas_dirs_find()

Search directories for images

findonpath()

findonpath

geo2utm()

Look up UTM zone

null2na()

Convert NULL values to NA

Unit Conversion Functions

Unit conversion functions

m2ft() ft2m() cm2in() msq2acres()

Unit conversion functions
